## How to use this reporting guideline {#how-to-use}

You can use <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemreporting_guideline" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">reporting guidelines</span> throughout your research process. 

* When writing: consult the full guidance when writing manuscripts, <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemprotocol" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">protocols</span>, and applications. The summary below provides a useful overview, and each item links to fuller guidance with explanations and examples.
* After writing: Complete a checklist and include it with your journal submission.
* To learn: Use {{< meta acronym >}} and our [training](/training.qmd) to develop as an academic and build writing skills.

However you use {{< meta acronym >}}, please [cite it](faqs.qmd#citation).

## Summary of guidance {#summary}

Although you should describe all items below, you can decide how to [order](faqs.qmd#item-order) and [prioritize items](faqs.qmd#concise-writing) most relevant to your study, findings, context, and readership whilst [keeping your writing concise](faqs.qmd#concise-writing). You can read how {{< meta acronym >}} was developed in the [FAQs](faqs.qmd#development).




+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|Item name                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |What to write                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|\ **<!-- -->Title & Abstract**                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Title](items/title.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |Describe the nature and topic of the study. Identify the study as qualitative or indicate the <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemapproach" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">approach</span> or <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemdataCollectionMethods" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">data collection methods</span>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Abstract](items/abstract.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |Summarise the key elements of the study using the abstract format of the intended publication.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|\ **<!-- -->Introduction**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Problem Formulation](items/problem-formulation.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                      |Describe the problem/phenomenon studied, its significance, relevant theory and empirical work, and gaps in current knowledge.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Purpose or research question](items/purpose.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                         |Describe the purpose of the study and specific objectives or questions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|\ **<!-- -->Methods**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Qualitative approach and research paradigm](items/qualitative-approach.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                              |Describe your qualitative <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemapproach" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">approach</span>, your guiding theory (if appropriate), and <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemresearch_paradigm" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">research paradigm</span>, and reasons for your choices.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Researcher characteristics and reflexivity](items/researcher-characteristics-and-reflexivity.qmd)                                                                                                                                                        |Describe how researchersâ€™ characteristics may influence the research, including personal attributes, qualifications/experience, relationship with participants, assumptions, and/or presuppositions; potential or actual interaction between researchersâ€™ characteristics and the research questions, <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemapproach" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">approach</span>, methods, results and/or <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItem13" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">transferability</span>.                                                                                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Context](items/context.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |Describe the setting/site(s) in which the study was conducted, why it was selected, and any other salient contextual factors that may influence the study.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Sampling strategy](items/sampling-strategy.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                          |Describe how and why research participants, documents, or events were selected; criteria for deciding when no further sampling was necessary, and the rationale for those criteria.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Ethical issues pertaining to human subjects](items/ethics.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                           |Describe any approval by an appropriate ethics review board and participant consent, or explain any lack thereof. Describe any other confidentiality and data security issues.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Data collection methods](items/data-collection-methods.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                              |Describe the types of data collected; details of <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemdataCollectionMethods" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">data collection procedures</span> including (as appropriate) start and stop dates of data collection and analysis, <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItem6" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">iterative</span> process, triangulation of sources/methods, and modification of procedures in response to evolving study findings. Describe your rationale for these choices.                                                                                                                                                             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Data collection instruments and technologies](items/data-collection-instruments.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                     |Describe any <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItem1" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">instruments</span> (e.g., interview guides, questionnaires) and devices (e.g., audio recorders) used for data collection; describe if/how the instrument(s) changed over the course of the study.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Units of study](items/units-of-study.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                                |Describe the number and relevant characteristics of participants, documents, or events included in the study. Describe the level of participation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Data processing](items/data-processing.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                              |Describe the methods for processing data prior to and during analysis, including transcription, data entry, data management and security, verification of data integrity, data coding, and anonymisation / deidentification of excerpts.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Data analysis](items/data-analysis.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |Describe the process by which inferences, themes, etc. were identified and developed, including the researchers involved in data analysis; usually references a specific <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemresearch_paradigm" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">paradigm</span> or <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItemapproach" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">approach</span>. Describe why you chose this process.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Techniques to enhance trustworthiness](items/trustworthiness.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                        |Describe any techniques to enhance trustworthiness and credibility of data analysis,(e.g., member checking, triangulation, audit trail). Describe why you chose these techniques.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|\ **<!-- -->Results**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Synthesis and interpretation](items/synthesis-and-interpretation.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                    |Describe the main findings (e.g., interpretations, inferences, and themes); might include development of a theory or model, or integration with prior research or theory.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Links to empirical data](items/links-to-empirical-data.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                              |Provide evidence (e.g., quotes, field notes, text excerpts, photographs) to substantiate <span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItem15" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">analytic findings</span>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|\ **<!-- -->Discussion**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Integration with prior work, implications, transferability, and contribution(s) to the field](items/integration-with-prior-work.qmd)                                                                                                                     |Summarize the main findings, explain how findings and conclusions connect to, support, elaborate on, or challenge conclusions of earlier scholarship; discuss the scope of application/<span class="defined" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" href="#glossaryItem14" aria-controls="offcanvasExample" role="button">generalizability</span>; identify unique contribution(s) to scholarship in a discipline or field.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Limitations](items/limitations.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |Discuss the trustworthiness and limitations of findings                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|\ **<!-- -->Other**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Conflicts of interest](items/conflicts-of-interest.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                  |Describe any potential sources of influence or perceived influence on study conduct and conclusions. Describe how these were managed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|[Funding](items/funding.qmd)                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |Describe sources of funding and other support. Describe the role of funders in data collection, interpretation, and reporting.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
